column4: you know what really grinds my wheels!? Randomly my mouse gets screwed and I cant click on anything, and I cant alt+tab to other windows unless I close the current one
it's annoying!!!
like, right now I cant click out of xchat
wtf
causes this?
I am in gnome
and using ubuntu 9.04
any ideas!?
also, when I log into kde, there is now wireless access
Your lucky you can close the window your working in.
what causes this!?
9.04 will completly lock up on me pretty regularly.
really?
I wish I knew.  A lot of people have been thinking it was video drivers.  If you look on luanchpad you will see several bug reports
It does not seem to matter if you are running an ATI card, Nvidia card or Intel card.
If you have another system you can ssh in and safely reboot.
it seems ctrl+alt+backspace doesnt go to gdm
nah, I can reboot just fine
for most, myself included the magic sysreq setquence doesn't even help.
ctrl+alt+backspace has been disabled in 9.04.  You can turn it back on.  There is a utility that will do so for you.
ah
sudo /etc/init.d/gdm restart
I just sent some questions in #LinuxHelp
